Package index

Outlier Detection

Detect outliers using a modified mahalanobis distance method of my own design.

find_outliers()
Detect outliers
tidy_mahalanobis()
Calculate Mahalanobis Distance

Sociophonetics Functions

Miscelleneous functions useful when working in sociophonetics.

eucl_dist()
Measure euclidean distance
pillai() manova_p()
Calculate Pillai scores
lbms_index()
Low-Back-Merger Shift Index
joeyr_norm_anae() norm_anae()
ANAE Vowel Normalization
joeyr_norm_deltaF() norm_deltaF()
∆F Normalization
joeyr_norm_logmeans() norm_logmeans()
Log-means normalization
switch_transcriptions() arpa_to_b_t() arpa_to_ipa() arpa_to_wells() b_t_to_arpa() b_t_to_ipa() b_t_to_wells() ipa_to_arpa() ipa_to_b_t() ipa_to_wells() wells_to_arpa() wells_to_ipa() wells_to_b_t()
Switch between transcription systems.
code_allophones()
Code allophones
fave_to_wells()
Recode FAVE output to Wells. Not as robust as `switch_allophones` but I'm tired of copying this code over.
OoO()
Order of Operations Reminder
